oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ambrotype of Nancy Jane Coburn Evans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ambrotype of Nancy Jane Coburn Evans, wife of Confederate Pvt. Simpson Evans. Jewelry has been painted in on the ambrotype. She was born April 12, 1840, in Hardeman County, Tenn. She died May 24, 1930, in Fayette County, Tenn. She married Simpson; Evans on February 28, 1858. He enlisted in Co. A, McGehee's Regiment, Arkansas Cav., CSA, on June 17, 1862. She is buried at Mt. Pleasant Cemetery, Hickory Withe (Fayette County), Tenn.
